directions: Mix crushed tomatoes, diced dill pickles, chopped onion, dill pickle juice, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, lime juice, sugar, salt, red pepper flakes, chili powder, cumin, and black pepper together in a bowl.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate 24 hours.
ingredients: 1 cup diced dill pickles, or more to taste
title: Dill Pickle Salsa
